body: The dependencies on `py-funcsigs`, `py-singledispatch` and `py-enum34` were only needed till version 0.47 according to the [`setup.py`](https://github.com/numba/numba/blob/0.47.0/setup.py#L312). From version 0.48 they are removed from the [`setup.py`](https://github.com/numba/numba/blob/0.48.0/setup.py#L311).
title: py-numba: add 0.54.0 and restrict old dependencies
